description: Shows useful information about credits in a dropdown menu in main navbar.
name: Credits Expansion

alerts.description: As soon as you've reached one of the set amount of credits, credits expansion will be highlighted green until you click it.
alerts.title: Goals

coinsInNavbar.description: Shows current coins in navbar instead of the cute piggy bank.
coinsInNavbar.title: Coins instead of piggy bank

creditsInNavbar.description: Shows current credits in navbar instead of the cute piggy bank.
creditsInNavbar.title: Credits instead of piggy bank

highlightSales.description: Highlights Coins green if a sale is available
highlightSales.title: highlight Sales

showSales.description: Shows Sales for Coins when available.
showSales.title: show Sales

showToplistPosition.description: Shows the current toplist-rank in the creditsextension.
showToplistPosition.title: Toplist-Rank in creditsextension
